BOARD OF EDUCATION

DIVISION OF AUDIO'VISUAL EDUCATION
1517 SOUTH THERESA AVENUE (4)
October f>, 1955
Dear John:
Mr. John Holt, Manager
NAEB Tape Network
llli Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Enclosed is a copy of the letter and questionnaire that the
Ih-School Committee asked me to compose.
I do not have the list of stations to whom this should be
sent so I think it is wise for me to send this on to you and
ask that the letter and questionnaire be sent out and returnÂ¬
ed to you. If I can get the answers soon enough to compile a
report and if you want me to, 1*11 be glad to do that part of
it.
Please feel free to make any changes you think should be made.
I decided it was best to include all five years instead of just
last year since we had the fewest offerings last year. However,
1*11 leave that up to you.
Hastily,
St ation KSLH
